tehlukesizlikenazarattext: Ensuring a safe environment at work
tehlukesizlikenazarattextmodal: At Profbeton, safety control is aimed at preventing any risks in the workplace. The company adheres to safety regulations to protect employees' health, conducts regular inspections, and provides training. All risks are carefully analyzed to create a safe working environment, and appropriate measures are taken.
as_prof_group_intro: Profbeton manufactures the best products in the concrete sector, tailored to the needs of its customers. Our goal is not only to provide high-quality products, but also to understand the needs of our customers and offer them the most suitable solutions. Profbeton is a trusted partner that is always by your side to achieve safe and sustainable results. By offering long-term and reliable solutions, we make our clients' work easier. Each project requires an individual approach, and we always prioritize customer satisfaction.
Profbetonmeqsedbasliq: Let’s move forward together and rise towards success.
Profbetonmeqsedtext: At Profbeton, our primary goal is to create value in the construction sector through close collaboration with our clients. We are committed to understanding our clients' needs and providing them with high-quality and durable solutions. Our aim is to leverage innovative technologies to optimize production processes, consistently meet our clients' expectations, and build long-term business relationships with them. We strive not only to execute today’s projects but also to lay a solid foundation for future generations. Profbeton – your reliable partner on the path to sustainable development.
homesec1binatext: We trust in a strategy built on honesty, quality, efficiency, collaboration, and entrepreneurship, recognizing the value of our trust.
bordyurtext: A curbstone separates the edges of roads.
bordyurmodaltext: A curb is a stone, either straight or curved, used to define and separate the edges of roads and sidewalks. They are made from concrete, stone, or asphalt and are used to direct water flow and enhance the aesthetic appearance of an area. Curbs are widely used in urban planning, landscape design, and road construction.
trust_and_progress: Let's move forward with confidence and rise with faith towards our goals!
profbeton_intro: Profbeton LLC specializes in industrial and construction material production
profbeton_description: We supply ready-mixed concrete, mortar, aggregate, and reinforced concrete products for both high-rise construction and the private sector. Our own fleet and the ability to attract rented vehicles allow us to handle any amount of work.
fire_safety_intro: Supply and repair of fire-fighting and life-saving equipment.
fire_safety_description: The main direction of activity is the sale, installation, technical service, repair, and quality restoration of rescue equipment, primary fire extinguishing means, fire protection, fire alarm systems, and means.
as_lift_description: Sales and technical service of various types of Elevators, Escalators, Construction Elevators, BMU (Facade Service Equipment), Automatic Entrance Systems, Fire Exit Doors, Ramp and Canopy Systems.
as_prof_intro: Professional engineering advice and support services.
as_prof_description: Engineering consulting includes the design and planning of engineering projects, technical inspection of existing systems, solving engineering problems and improving work processes, risk analysis and ensuring the safety of projects, managing and controlling engineering projects, as well as contract preparation.
baku_construction_description: Insulation is used to create thermal resistance around your building, save money, and create a comfortable space. When properly installed, insulation reduces heating and cooling costs by maintaining cool air inside the building and reducing heat loss.
vacnyZirveler: Are you ready to reach new heights together?
shirketlernavbeton1: The company Profbeton  manufactures industrial and construction materials
vshirketlernavbeton2: We supply ready-mix concrete, concrete mixtures, aggregates, and reinforced concrete products for both multi-story construction and the private sector. Our fleet of vehicles and trucks allows us to handle any amount of work. We provide a passport and quality certificate for each concrete batch. We conduct quality control for every batch of ready-mix concrete. Our concrete is manufacturer-produced. For Profbeton LLC, the most important aspect is constructive mutually beneficial cooperation with a wide range of customers, ensuring their needs and requirements are met to the maximum extent.
shirketlernavlift1: Implementation of sales of various types of elevators, escalators, and provision of technical servicing
shirketlernavlift2: One of our main areas of activity is the implementation of sales for various types of lifts, escalators, construction lifts, Building Maintenance Units (BMUs), Automatic Entrance Systems, Fire Exit Doors, Ramp and Dock Systems, along with providing technical servicing. We focus on ensuring the safety and independent mobility of our clients in their workplaces or residential properties. Elevators and escalators facilitate easy movement within buildings, construction lifts enable the smooth ascent and descent of workers and materials during building construction. BMUs and ramps provide a safe working environment for facade work or in conditions of limited mobility. Fire exit doors and automatic entrance systems provide effective means of safe egress from or ingress into buildings. Ramp and dock systems ease access and egress from spaces for individuals with limited mobility or disabilities. Our aim is to ensure the safety and comfort of our clients through the provision of professional and technical support.
shirketlernaASPEK1: To provide professional consulting and support services in the field of engineering to companies and individuals.
shirketlernavASPEK2: Engineering consulting, design and planning of engineering projects, technical inspection of existing systems, solving engineering problems and improving work processes, project risk analysis and safety assurance, management and supervision of engineering projects, as well as contract preparation are among our fields. We offer engineering consulting services to provide continuous support to our clients in the implementation of their projects. We strive to achieve the best solutions for the phased and efficient execution of projects. Starting with technical inspection and risk analysis of projects, we ensure the effective operation of existing systems. Our professional engineers provide technical support to clients for solving engineering problems and improving work processes. Additionally, we assist our clients in project management, supervision, and contract preparation. Our goal is to help our clients achieve the best possible implementation of their projects.
shirketlernavBCC2: Insulation is used to create thermal resistance around your building, save money, and create a comfortable environment. When properly installed, insulation reduces heating and cooling costs by retaining cool air inside the building and reducing heat loss. This helps make the building's spaces more cozy and comfortable, while also reducing the operating time and costs of heating and cooling systems. Insulation measures result in maintaining coolness inside the building and minimizing heat loss. This also increases energy efficiency and provides long-term cost savings.
shirketlernaFire1: Supply and repair of firefighting and lifesaving equipment.
shirketlernavFire2: The main area of activity involves the sale, installation, technical service, repair, and quality restoration of rescue equipment, initial firefighting tools, fire protection systems, and fire alarm systems on facilities. These activities are intended to ensure the safety and security measures for clients and to take additional measures to protect against existing fire risks. Rescue equipment, firefighting systems, and other safety resources constitute essential measures to extinguish existing fires or to prevent the spread of fire. Providing experienced and high-quality services in this field, gaining the trust of clients, and adhering to safety standards are among the main goals.
shirketlernakomanda-muraciet1: If this vacancy interests you, feel free to send your CV to the address CV@asprof.az. Don't forget to mention the name of the vacancy in the subject of your email. Also, please note that only selected candidates will be contacted at the next stage. Good luck!
keyfiyyetenezarettext: At each stage, special quality control is applied to ensure the durability of the concrete.
istehsalprosesinenezarettext: Full control at every stage to ensure quality.
Betonlaboratoriyalaritext: The quality and strength of the concrete are tested through specialized laboratory tests.
Sementxemiritext: Cement paste is prepared in appropriate proportions for strong and durable concrete.
keyfiyyetenezarettextmodal: Quality control is a process that ensures the compliance of products and services with standards, as well as their reliability and safety. Profbeton MMC continuously monitors the quality of inspection, warranty, and delivery of its products and services.
istehsalprosesinenezarettextmodal: Profbeton  controls the production processes in accordance with the international ISO 9001 quality management system and regulatory-technical documents. Our company consistently applies these systems, ensuring that the quality of raw materials and finished products meets international standards.
Betonlaboratoriyalaritextmodal: To ensure the high quality of produced concrete products, the quality of raw materials, mineral additives, and finished products is regularly tested in a modern laboratory belonging to the factory and meeting international standards. This provides concrete with properties like water resistance, frost resistance, and sulfate resistance.
Sementxemiritextmodal: A concrete mixture consists of five main components: water, cement, aggregates, chemical, and mineral additives. Water and cement create a plastic mass (cement paste) that, through a chemical reaction known as hydration, binds materials into a rock-like mass.
xidmetlerbetondashimabloktext: Safe and timely delivery of concrete to any destination is ensured.
xidmetlerbetonpompalamabloktext: Modern and reliable equipment is used for fast and precise distribution of concrete.
xidmetlerbetonpompalamamodaltext: Concrete pumping service delivers concrete quickly and accurately to hard-to-reach areas, high-rise buildings, and narrow spaces using specialized pumps. This process speeds up construction work, ensures even distribution of concrete, and maintains its quality. Profbeton offers safe and high-quality concrete pumping services with modern equipment.
yukdashimaxidmetitext: We ensure the safe and quick delivery of your cargo.
Universalkonteynerlerindashinmasitext: Reliable and neat transportation of containers of various sizes.
Demirdashimatext: Professional and stable transport of iron products.
Concrete_transportationtext: Delivery of concrete intact and on time.
yukdashimaxidmetimodal: With our cargo transportation service, we deliver various-sized and categorized cargo safely and efficiently to your desired destination. Our specialized drivers and robust transport vehicles ensure safe cargo transportation. Our order-based planning and tracking system ensures timely and seamless delivery to any location.
Universalkonteynerlerindashinmasimodal: The universal container transportation service ensures the safe and reliable delivery of goods. Standard-sized containers provide protection even in challenging conditions, making them ideal for both local and international transportation.
Demirdashimamodal: Our iron transportation service delivers iron materials for construction and industrial purposes according to your needs. This service ensures the safe transport of iron products of any size and weight. With specialized vehicles and professional drivers, it is the ideal choice for timely and undamaged delivery of iron.
Concrete_transportationmodal: Our concrete transportation service ensures high-quality and timely delivery to your construction sites. Transported in special concrete mixer trucks, the concrete is handled in accordance with regulations during transit, ensuring stability and durability at your application site. Our fully experienced team is available to guarantee the safe transport and delivery of concrete.
Betonpompasitext: A device that ensures the fast and safe transfer of concrete.
Pompazavodutext: A facility specializing in the production and maintenance of pumps.
Betonvepompasatishitext: Supply of quality concrete and equipment for construction.
Betonpompasimodal: Our concrete pump service provides the most advanced equipment to deliver concrete to the necessary points on construction sites. With a concrete pump, it is easy to transport concrete to high floors, narrow passages, and hard-to-reach areas. We ensure a fast, precise, and safe process with a professional team and reliable equipment.
Pompazavodumodal: The concrete pump plant is the hub of processes designed for pouring concrete with high quality and safety. The plant is equipped with technologies that ensure the flawless operation of pump systems. During operation, site cleanliness and appropriate conditions for the pump are initially ensured. The area for placing machines and equipment must be stable, and molds must be prepared strong and clean. Using the pump plant, concrete is poured vertically into molds from an optimal distance without adding water. During the pouring process, the stability of the reinforcement and the homogeneity of the concrete are ensured. After the process, measures are taken to regularly water and maintain the concrete's moisture. This plant's operating principles ensure the highest levels of quality and safety for your projects.
Betonvepompasatishimodal: Our concrete and pump sales service offers our customers both quality concrete mixtures and the most advanced concrete pumps. We help achieve maximum productivity on construction sites with a range of products suitable for different projects. By providing after-sales support and technical services, we ensure the satisfaction of our customers at all times. Quality and reliability are our top priorities.
Fibrobetontext: High-strength concrete reinforced with fine fibers
Fibrobetonmodaltext: Fibro concrete is a type of concrete specifically designed for high strength and durability. The micro-fiber materials inside increase the firmness of the concrete and reduce the risk of cracking. Fibro concrete is widely used in the construction sector, especially in road and bridge construction, structures carrying heavy loads, as well as in wall coverings and floor surfaces. Profbeton brand's fibro concrete has excellent quality and long durability.
Solidbetontext: Dense and durable concrete for strong structures
Solidbetonmodaltext: Solid concrete is a type of concrete with high density and durability, primarily used in construction and building sectors for structures under heavy load. This type of concrete is ideal for floors, foundations, columns, and other heavy construction elements. Profbeton brand's solid concrete is recognized for its high quality and long-term performance. It is ideal for dense and strong structures.
Demirbetonmemulatlaritext: The perfect combination of steel and concrete
Demirbetonmemulatlarimodaltext: Steel-concrete products are made by adding steel bars inside concrete to enhance its strength. These materials are used for construction structures that need to withstand high tension and heavy loads. Profbeton offers quality steel-concrete products that can be used at every stage of construction, especially in foundations and columns. It ensures a perfect combination and high strength.
Tametdashlarimodaltext: Tamet stones are lightweight, sturdy, and aesthetically appealing stone materials. These stones are mainly used in urban planning, parks, roads, and squares. Profbeton Tamet stones are also perfect for traffic passage. They provide high quality and durability and adapt to any environment with their aesthetic appearance.
Polistrenbetondivarlartext: Effective wall material for thermal insulation
Polistrenbetondivarlarmodaltext: Polystyrene concrete walls are chosen for both their insulation properties and high structural strength. This material provides thermal insulation for buildings and reduces energy consumption. Profbeton polystyrene concrete walls are used in areas requiring thermal protection and sound insulation in construction. This material is durable and economically beneficial.
Masamalihorgubloklarimodaltext: Cellular masonry blocks are lightweight and have low density, which helps reduce energy consumption in any construction project. Profbeton cellular masonry blocks provide both insulation and stability when forming the walls of a building. These blocks are widely used in internal wall structures, as well as back and side walls.
Qumbetondivarlarmodaltext: Sand concrete walls combine the strength of concrete and the economic advantages of sand. These walls are widely used in construction projects with simple structures. Profbeton sand concrete walls ensure both structural stability and cost-effectiveness. This material offers significant advantages in local construction and wall construction.
Betondivarbloklarimodaltext: Concrete wall blocks are produced in various sizes and shapes, providing strong and long-lasting wall constructions. Profbeton concrete wall blocks are widely used in the construction sector. These blocks ensure the long-term durability of structures by carrying heavy loads. They are built with ideal features and high quality.
Damirbetonkonstruksiyalarimodaltext: Steel-concrete constructions are materials made from the perfect combination of concrete and steel, used for structures under high tension and load. Profbeton brand's steel-concrete constructions provide high quality and durability. These constructions are used as key structural elements in construction and infrastructure projects.
emteebetonutext: Variety of construction and commercial concrete
emteebetonutextmodal: Commodity concrete is a general type of concrete used for various construction works and commercial purposes. This concrete can be used in various structural constructions, including building facades. Profbeton commodity concrete is made from high-quality materials and is significantly durable. It is mainly used in the construction of roads and buildings.
Sekidashlaritextmodal: Paving stones are mainly used in urban planning and public construction. Profbeton paving stones are produced in various colors and sizes. These stones are both aesthetically beautiful and durable, providing both appearance and long-lasting use. Paving stones are widely used in roads, parks, and squares.
Metalkarkastextmodal: Metal frames are used in the structure of buildings, ensuring the stability of large buildings and infrastructure projects. Profbeton metal frames are made from sturdy and durable materials and can carry heavy loads. These frames are used in multi-story buildings, bridges, and other infrastructure projects.
Divarbloklaritext: Block materials for various wall constructions
Divarbloklaritextmodal: Wall blocks are produced in various sizes and shapes and are one of the essential materials in construction. Profbeton wall blocks are of high quality and are used in the formation of main structures in construction works. These blocks are used in the construction of walls and other construction elements.
Betonvequmchinqilistehsalitextmodal: Concrete and sand-gravel are widely used materials in construction. Profbeton produces these materials with high quality and can be used in every stage of construction. Concrete forms the foundation of various structures, while gravel is widely used for floors and foundational works.
Sementtextmodal: Cement is the most essential binding substance among construction materials. Profbeton cement is of high quality and is used in every stage of construction, including concrete preparation, tiling, and other construction works. It ensures high strength and durability.
